title: I'm overfitting and I know it
description: Attention! Warning! Use at your own risk!If you are going to use pseudo labeling technique (which is used in this kernel) make sure you understand what you are doing. Otherwise you will horribly overfit to Public LB and will be shaken down on Private LB. Thus you should not use this submission as is, but instead find a way to improve your model with this technique.
